details.address: 2024 Bridgemill Dr Suite 112, Indian Land, SC 29707
details.description: Teaplus is a Boba Tea shop first introduced in Boca Raton,Florida. It mainly based on tea beverage and has a signatures cheese Foam. It’s creamy, sweet with a bit of salty taste it has a perfect texture make it the perfect complement to our freshly brewed teas. Our delicious cheese foam is hand-crafted for each customer and made with the highest quality ingredients.

reviews_data.review_text:
I recently visited Tea Plus and had the pleasure of trying their Thai tea latte, and it was absolutely delicious! The flavors were rich and perfectly balanced, making for a delightful experience. The atmosphere of the café was inviting, and I was impressed by the cleanliness of the space.

Additionally, the staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, adding a personal touch to my visit. Overall, I highly recommend Tea Plus for anyone looking to enjoy a tasty tea and a pleasant environment. I can’t wait to return and try more of their offerings!

As a tea lover from Taiwan, the taste of tea from Tea Plus is authentic and satisfying.  Apart from great drinks, you can't miss Tonkatsu Ramen for a flavorful treat.  The owner and staff are super friendly.

We went to Tea Plus for the first time last weekend, and ordered the Salt & Pepper Basil Chicken, Super Fruit Tea, Fresh Lemon Green Tea and Honeydew Milk Tea.  All the food and drinks were well cooked and crafted and very fresh, we will definitely go back to try other dishes/drinks on their menu.

By the way, the staff and the owner were really friendly and caring.  I am so glad to find this new bubble tea shop in Indian Land.
Tried the Brulee Milk Tea with Boba and its great. If you want a really sweet tea ask them to add sweetener to your tea. Its got some vanilla pudding in the tea and I added extra boba.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your honest evaluation. We hope to see you again soon to try our other drinks and snacks! Thank you again!!!😄

reviews_data.review_text: I recently visited tea plus and was absolutely blown away by the experience. The staff is incredibly hardworking and always greets customers with a smile. The boba tea here is some of the best I've ever tasted—each sip is a perfect balance of flavor and sweetness. Whether you're looking for a cozy spot to relax or just grabbing a quick drink, tea plus is the place to be. Keep up the great work!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your true evaluation. We uphold the best service and the best product quality. Let customers feel at home. Teaplus is a good place to relax.

reviews_data.review_text: We love tea plus! The service is great and they are so sweet! The boba is always the perfect texture and the flavors are all so good! My girls always prefer Teaplus over any other boba place! Thank you guys! And the interior is so cute!!
We love this place! They have the best taro tea! The dumplings and chicken are delicious too! They have a kids corner to keep our little guy occupied while we wait!
Love love love. I got the mago lemonade with mango popping bubbles and I’m obsessed!! Will be back for sure !
Our family favorite place and best Taro Boba tea in the whole Charlotte area!
Really good food and service. Bento box with the salt and pepper chicken!! Wow!!
Great local boba and food for good price

I am OBSESSED with this place, & their organic green tea matcha’s!!! so so so great, wish it was a little cheaper, but it’s still worth it. they are nice, & professional too. let’s keep them in business guys, I NEED THIS TEA FOREVER LOL

Update!!! So I’ve had the organic green tea matcha latte w/ oat milk 9 times now!! I get my free one next visit which I’m very happy about lol. Life can be hard, & we all need “pick me ups” & this is my FAVORITE pick me up drink, it’s not only delicious, but it’s HIGH quality. I always leave happier, & that’s what I love most. I use to not be a flavored drink girly, very picky, but I saw that this was a new store, & was into trying green matcha for the first time. & safe to say It was love at first sip! Given that this is a new establishment, I am amazed at how lovely this place is not only to me, but hundreds of other people. I wish everyone knew about Tea Plus, the customer service is out of this world. Their cafe is also cute, & clean!! I can proudly say I am one of there most loyal customers, & i don’t see that changing!! Thank you guys so much at Tea Plus for being so wonderful !!

Update!! Tried a newer matcha latte they offered me, & once again they did not disappoint! The original matcha latte I get is more creamy (which I am obsessed with), & the newer is less creamy, making the matcha stand out more! (which is just as amazing!) having the option to choose between the both in the future would be perfect in my opinion because everyone has preference ofc! Both are equally tasty in my opinion! The lovely staff at Tea Plus always make me feel welcomed, & leave me feeling satisfied no matter what. I’m so happy their business is doing so well, come check them out!

Back againnnnn, I used my stamp coupon for a free drink!! My One & only organic matcha latte with oat milk. Perfect pick me up, on days like this where I got 0 sleep LOL! Everyone was super nice as usual, come check them out you won’t be disappointed!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! We're thrilled to hear that you love our organic green tea matcha. We strive to provide the best quality, and your support means the world to us. We'll continue to work hard to keep you satisfied. Thanks for the review —your passion for our tea truly brightens our day!

reviews_data.review_text: Milk tea is so good, not to sweet. Topping good, must try popping boba for fruit tea.
Solid choice for a quick snack or something to drink.  Their food choices are simple but their food is great, better than a lot of Chinese restaurants
Speedy and kindest individuals working! They have a wide selection, weather you love Boba or you have never tried it! You’ve gotta give this place a try!

Craving a boba fix, we headed over to Tea Plus. Their mango pomelo with sago, passion fruit tea, strawberry matcha, and brown sugar latte with pudding were absolute hits! It had been ages since we'd indulged in such refreshing boba drinks.

While the prices are a bit on the steep side (as we've seen everywhere these days), I'll give the drinks a five-star. The cozy atmosphere and cute decor make it the perfect spot to chill and enjoy a refreshing beverage. I highly recommend checking it out!

Seriously the best food. Best boba. Best service. The owner and his mother are very kind and attentive. They make the tea from scratch and so it is flavorful and not too sweet. The food is also wonderful. Best salt and pepper chicken I’ve had. Ask for the spicy seasoning to go with it. Changes the whole flavor in a good way.
Very friendly, great selection of drink and smoothie choices. My daughters enjoyed a wonderful Strawberry smoothie and amazing lemonade Boba! Can't wait to come back to try the homemade Ramen Bowls!

The boba drink had potential, but it was far too watered down. The flavor wasn’t as rich as it should have been, and it felt like I was drinking mostly water instead of a proper milk tea. The boba pearls themselves were good, but the overall experience was disappointing because the taste was just too diluted.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you for your honest feedback. We're sorry to hear that your experience didn't meet your expectations. We take pride in the quality of our drinks, and it sounds like we missed the mark this time. We'll look into this issue to ensure it doesn’t happen again. We’d love to make it right please feel free to stop by again, and we’ll happily make you another drink to your liking. Your satisfaction is important to us! 

If you can leave your name and the drink you got.

One server has even researched health benefits of the boba teas! Try it! You will not regret it!

I recently visited Tea Plus and had the pleasure of trying their Thai tea latte, and it was absolutely delicious! The flavors were rich and perfectly balanced, making for a delightful experience. The atmosphere of the café was inviting, and I was impressed by the cleanliness of the space.

Additionally, the staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, adding a personal touch to my visit. Overall, I highly recommend Tea Plus for anyone looking to enjoy a tasty tea and a pleasant environment. I can’t wait to return and try more of their offerings!

As a tea lover from Taiwan, the taste of tea from Tea Plus is authentic and satisfying.  Apart from great drinks, you can't miss Tonkatsu Ramen for a flavorful treat.  The owner and staff are super friendly.

We went to Tea Plus for the first time last weekend, and ordered the Salt & Pepper Basil Chicken, Super Fruit Tea, Fresh Lemon Green Tea and Honeydew Milk Tea.  All the food and drinks were well cooked and crafted and very fresh, we will definitely go back to try other dishes/drinks on their menu.

By the way, the staff and the owner were really friendly and caring.  I am so glad to find this new bubble tea shop in Indian Land.

reviews_data.review_text: We love tea plus! The service is great and they are so sweet! The boba is always the perfect texture and the flavors are all so good! My girls always prefer Teaplus over any other boba place! Thank you guys! And the interior is so cute!!

Love love love. I got the mago lemonade with mango popping bubbles and I’m obsessed!! Will be back for sure !

I am OBSESSED with this place, & their organic green tea matcha’s!!! so so so great, wish it was a little cheaper, but it’s still worth it. they are nice, & professional too. let’s keep them in business guys, I NEED THIS TEA FOREVER LOL

Update!!! So I’ve had the organic green tea matcha latte w/ oat milk 9 times now!! I get my free one next visit which I’m very happy about lol. Life can be hard, & we all need “pick me ups” & this is my FAVORITE pick me up drink, it’s not only delicious, but it’s HIGH quality. I always leave happier, & that’s what I love most. I use to not be a flavored drink girly, very picky, but I saw that this was a new store, & was into trying green matcha for the first time. & safe to say It was love at first sip! Given that this is a new establishment, I am amazed at how lovely this place is not only to me, but hundreds of other people. I wish everyone knew about Tea Plus, the customer service is out of this world. Their cafe is also cute, & clean!! I can proudly say I am one of there most loyal customers, & i don’t see that changing!! Thank you guys so much at Tea Plus for being so wonderful !!

Update!! Tried a newer matcha latte they offered me, & once again they did not disappoint! The original matcha latte I get is more creamy (which I am obsessed with), & the newer is less creamy, making the matcha stand out more! (which is just as amazing!) having the option to choose between the both in the future would be perfect in my opinion because everyone has preference ofc! Both are equally tasty in my opinion! The lovely staff at Tea Plus always make me feel welcomed, & leave me feeling satisfied no matter what. I’m so happy their business is doing so well, come check them out!

Back againnnnn, I used my stamp coupon for a free drink!! My One & only organic matcha latte with oat milk. Perfect pick me up, on days like this where I got 0 sleep LOL! Everyone was super nice as usual, come check them out you won’t be disappointed!!!

reviews_data.review_text: Milk tea is so good, not to sweet. Topping good, must try popping boba for fruit tea.

Craving a boba fix, we headed over to Tea Plus. Their mango pomelo with sago, passion fruit tea, strawberry matcha, and brown sugar latte with pudding were absolute hits! It had been ages since we'd indulged in such refreshing boba drinks.

While the prices are a bit on the steep side (as we've seen everywhere these days), I'll give the drinks a five-star. The cozy atmosphere and cute decor make it the perfect spot to chill and enjoy a refreshing beverage. I highly recommend checking it out!

Seriously the best food. Best boba. Best service. The owner and his mother are very kind and attentive. They make the tea from scratch and so it is flavorful and not too sweet. The food is also wonderful. Best salt and pepper chicken I’ve had. Ask for the spicy seasoning to go with it. Changes the whole flavor in a good way.
Very friendly, great selection of drink and smoothie choices. My daughters enjoyed a wonderful Strawberry smoothie and amazing lemonade Boba! Can't wait to come back to try the homemade Ramen Bowls!

The boba drink had potential, but it was far too watered down. The flavor wasn’t as rich as it should have been, and it felt like I was drinking mostly water instead of a proper milk tea. The boba pearls themselves were good, but the overall experience was disappointing because the taste was just too diluted.
